Subject: RE: AD Authentication sync issue ||SATCOM||
Description:
Dear Team,

we have tried to sync our AD authentication for admin logins, but we are facing issue, please help for the same on priority basis.

Regards,
Sai
What_We_Know__c:
22.04:
We asked the customer if he saved the configuration and only after that he tested the connection.
In case that he already did it, we also asked for a screenshot of the error that he is receiving.
---
We received the screenshot and we decided that we need to schedule a remote session to check the issue.
---
Remote session scheduled for April 23, 12:30 PM IST

23.04:
After we replaced the User: (with the username only, not also the domain appended) and Active Directory Administrators Group: (with the group name from the AD), the test connection was successful.

23.04:

Solution_Comment__c:
After we replaced the User: (with the username only, not also the domain appended) and Active Directory Administrators Group: (with the group name from the AD), the test connection was successful. 
After that, we proceed to close the case.
